SOP-51.sop_text: One97 Communications Limited and its subsidiaries, affiliates and any other investments for the purpose

SOP-52.sop_text: of this policy are collectively referred to as “One97” or “the Company” or “Paytm”. One97 is committed

SOP-53.sop_text: to maintain the highest level of professional and  ethical standards in the conduct of the  business in India

SOP-54.sop_text: and around the world. This Policy is applicable to One97 including all full -time or part -time employees,

SOP-55.sop_text: interns , trainees , vendors, customers, third parties including contractors, sub -contractors to third parties or

SOP-56.sop_text: anyone who has access to, handles, use or process corporate information. All users must understand and

SOP-73.sop_text: The primary goal is to safeguard Paytm’s information and systems from damage, destruction,

SOP-74.sop_text: unau thorized disclosure, or modification, whether accidental or intentional. Additionally, Paytm's
SOP-74.iso_text: Privacy and protection of personally identifiable information

SOP-75.sop_text: information systems must adhere to relevant laws, regulations, and contractual obligations. Paytm is
SOP-75.iso_text: Compliance with security policies and standards

SOP-76.sop_text: dedicated to maintaining and continually enhancing its infor mation security measures.

SOP-77.sop_text: Information is the result of processing data in a way that adds to the knowledge of the receiver.

SOP-78.sop_text: Information can exist in many forms. It can be printed or written on paper, stored electronically,

SOP-79.sop_text: transmitted by post or by using electronic means, shown on films, or spoken in conversation.

SOP-80.sop_text: An asset is anything that has value to an organization. Any information, like other important business

SOP-81.sop_text: assets, which has value to business , is Information Asset. Information Systems which help in

SOP-82.sop_text: processing, storing and disseminating information are also Information Assets.

SOP-84.sop_text: Information Security is protection of Information and Information Assets, from a  wide range of threats

SOP-85.sop_text: to ensure business continuity and to minimize business risk thereby enhancing the return on

SOP-86.sop_text: investments. This is achieved by implementing a suitable set of controls, including policies, processes,

SOP-87.sop_text: procedures, organizational structure s and technology. These controls need to be established,

SOP-88.sop_text: implemented, monitored, reviewed and improved to ensure that the specific security and business
SOP-88.iso_text: Compliance with security policies and standards

SOP-89.sop_text: objectives of the organization are met. This should be done in conjunction with other business

SOP-91.sop_text: Information Security Program is based on the following principles:

SOP-92.sop_text: a. Confidentiality:  Protection of information by ensuring that information is accessible only to

SOP-93.sop_text: b. Integrity:  Assurin g the accuracy and completeness of information and its associated

SOP-94.sop_text: information processing methods and ensuring controls for preventing unauthorized

SOP-95.sop_text: c. Availability:  Ensuring that information and associated assets or systems are available to

SOP-97.sop_text: 7.5 What is Information Security Risk Management?

SOP-98.sop_text: An Information Security Risk is the probability that an Information Asset will be subjecte d to loss,

SOP-100.sop_text: Information Security Risk Management pertains to protecting critical information & reducing

SOP-101.sop_text: Information Security Risk for Paytm, including associated corporate assets and services by:

SOP-102.sop_text: a. Identification of security requirements and associated controls, based on a pre -defined
SOP-102.iso_text: Information security requirements analysis and specification

SOP-104.sop_text: b. Effective implementation of controls to minimize Information Security breach.

SOP-105.sop_text: c. Continuous monitoring & review of controls to deter mine their effectiveness.

SOP-107.sop_text:  Protect Information and Systems: Ensure that Paytm’s information and systems are safeguarded

SOP-108.sop_text: against damage, destruction, unauthorized access, and changes, whether they occur accidentally  or

SOP-109.sop_text:  Compliance: Ensure that Paytm’s information systems comply with all applicable laws,

SOP-111.sop_text:  Continuous Improvement: Maintain and continually improve Paytm’s information security

SOP-112.sop_text: practices to adapt to evo lving threats and standards.

SOP-223.sop_text: business activities to minimize information security losses. Refer ( Business Continuity Management Policy )
